Jerin

Korean: 제린

Thailand

Thanaporn Saengwanthong

Birthday:

Age:
20 years old
Height:
5'6" (168 cm)
Group (2021-present):
Beauty Box until Mar 12, 2023

Introduction

Jerin is a Thai rapper and singer. She is a former member of the girl group Beauty Box. She is also a former soloist, and a former member of the Thai girl group BLACK DOLLS. She debuted as a solo artist under the name TNT in 2020 with a song “My Word”.
